column1: officer-vic-3809,15 Tolkien Boulevard Officer VIC 3809,"ONLY THE BEST TOLKIEN WILL DO

Literally a few doors down the road is one of Arcadia's largest parks - complete with swing sets, walking trails and a basketball blacktop.

It's also walking distance to Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary School and the Officer Specialist School. It's also supremely close to Officer train station plus the new retail complex currently being built off Siding Avenue.
Only two years old the property includes thousands of $$$ worth of upgrades.

officer-vic-3809,2 Miller Street Officer VIC 3809,"Immaculate family home on a big block

This impeccably presented family home situated only moments away from all amenities Arcadia has to offer and presented for sale on a large 527m2* lot. Design with family growth in mind this property is a must see this weekend and will tick all the boxes.

From the moment you step through the large wooden door youre greeted with high ceilings and an oversized entrance hall. Timber flooring is present through the hallway and will lead you down the wide passageway into the Kitchen and the open plan living hub of the home.

The extravagant kitchen including 900mm gas top oven, dishwasher, excessive cupboard space, beautiful island bench with stone benchtops. The adjected living and dining area makes the home ideal for entertaining as you are overlooking the outdoor covered courtyard.

Featuring four good sized bedrooms including master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity and separate toilet, remaining three bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom which includes separate shower and bath.

The property is positioned perfect within highly sort after Estate Arcadia in Officer to enjoy all the amenities such as private & public schools, local parks and minutes from Arena and Lakeside shopping centres with M1 access within proximity.
Only on inspection will you truly appreciate what this impressive family-built home has to offer, with all the upgrades you would wish for, without the hassle of building!
As this is within a new Estate this area may not be displaying on Google Maps correctly.

officer-vic-3809,16 Parker Street Officer VIC 3809,"Park your future here!

Unlike any ordinary townhouse, this fresh and sophisticated three-bedroom dwelling redefines luxury design and simplicity. Built by Porter Davis Homes and only 2 months young and located in the beautiful Arcadia Estate in Officer.

Oozing quality, natural light throughout and packed with added features, this contemporary home offers open plan living, easy maintenance and excellent location. The is the perfect abode for first homeowners, downsizers or small families.

Spanning over two impressive levels, the clever layouts features living zones on each level, top level also includes a study area. The upper level comprising of a spacious master retreat complete with an ensuite and walk in robe. As well as two additional bedrooms both featuring built in robes serviced by the second bathroom and separate toilet.
The designer kitchen located on the lower level adds a sizable pantry, cabinetry, stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher, oven and four burner gas stovetop.

If its quality you are after this home will tick all your boxes, complete with a European laundry, downstairs powderoom, ducted heating and evaporative cooling which allows for a year-long comfort in the changing seasons.
- Double remote-control garage with internal/external access.
- Side gate access perfect for storing your trailers securely

Located perfectly in a family friendly estate with quality schools, one being the Officer Specialist School which is a stone throw away and just a short distance to the Arena shopping Centre where you have everything available including Woolworths, eateries, discount pharmacy and a selection of convenience stores.

Prepare to move straight in as all the hard work of designing and construction has been done for you. Be quick, buy now and invest for the future. Quality townhouses at this price wont last. Contact us today to schedule an inspection.

officer-vic-3809,11 Eloise Circuit Officer VIC 3809,"Effortless Modern Marvel
Meticulously presented this home will have you wanting more upon arrival. The feature merbau timber stairs leading you inside provides a statement as you admire this home.

Comprising of three light filled and spacious bedrooms, master suite entices large windows, walk in robe, ensuite with Californian shutters to window and feature pendant light. The remaining two bedrooms boast plush quality carpet, built in robes and double block out blinds all centrally located around the main bathroom, toilet and laundry. The main hub of the home integrates kitchen, dining area and living area. The kitchen itself provides luxurious and elegant features including, free standing 900mm Westinghouse oven & cooktop, Westinghouse dishwasher, 20mm caesar stone benchtops and subway feature tile splashback.
Extra internal features include, vinyl plank timber flooring, 2 x Daikin split system air conditioners, ducted heating, goose neck tap in kitchen, 8.5ft ceilings and led downlights.

Moving outside you have low maintenance gardens both front and back. Sir Walter Buffalo turf out the front provides greenery. Entertaining is taken care of with the pergola tacked onto the back of the house with solid 140mm merbau timber deck and bench storage seats. The camelias will grow and you will have lush deep green leaves and pink and white flowers in a nice hedge.

Located in Potters Grove Northside you are within walking distance to the very popular D'Angelo's Winery and Restaurant. A short drive to the M1 freeway or Officer train station where both will have you into the city within the hour.
